typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ws_sold_time_sk as integer,
		ws_ship_date_sk as integer,
		ws_item_sk as integer,
		ws_bill_customer_sk as integer,
		ws_bill_cdemo_sk as integer,
		ws_bill_hdemo_sk as integer,
		ws_bill_addr_sk as integer,
		ws_ship_customer_sk as integer,
		ws_ship_cdemo_sk as integer,
		ws_ship_hdemo_sk as integer,
		ws_ship_addr_sk as integer,
		ws_web_page_sk as integer,
		ws_web_site_sk as integer,
		ws_ship_mode_sk as integer,
		ws_warehouse_sk as integer,
		ws_promo_sk as integer,
		ws_order_number as long,
		ws_quantity as integer,
		ws_wholesale_cost as decimal(7,2),
		ws_list_price as decimal(7,2),
		ws_sales_price as decimal(7,2),
		ws_ext_discount_amt as decimal(7,2),
		ws_ext_sales_price as decimal(7,2),
		ws_ext_wholesale_cost as decimal(7,2),
		ws_ext_list_price as decimal(7,2),
		ws_ext_tax as decimal(7,2),
		ws_coupon_amt as decimal(7,2),
		ws_ext_ship_cost as decimal(7,2),
		ws_net_paid as decimal(7,2),
		ws_net_paid_inc_tax as decimal(7,2),
		ws_net_paid_inc_ship as decimal(7,2),
		ws_net_paid_inc_ship_tax as decimal(7,2),
		ws_net_profit as decimal(7,2),
		ws_sold_date_sk as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionRootPath: 'dbstorage100/TPC-DS/SourceFiles_parquet/web_sales',
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['TPC-DS/SourceFiles_parquet/web_sales']) ~> source1
